name: BusinessBuddha365
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A series of daily inspirational insights, phrases and sayings from Marius Müller, CEO and founder of BusinessBuddha. Listen to Marius talk about Limiting Beliefs, Self-Awareness, Self-Esteem, Consciousness, Perception, Presence, Meditation and more. 

This skill will help you to break through mental & emotional blocks, to life a free and self-determined life and bring your business to the next level! 

Stay tuned and start listening today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
